rescuer.harvey: Harvey patched you up at the clinic.
rescuer.linus: Linus found you and kept you warm.
rescuer.guild: The Adventurer's Guild dragged you to safety.
rescuer.spouse: Your partner took care of you at home.
rescuer.junimos: Junimos whisked you to a soft patch of grass.
rescuer.wake: You wake up where you fell.
config.enableMod.name: Enable mod
config.enableMod.tooltip: Master switch. Turn this off to completely disable Dynamic Sleeping Spots.
config.intensity.name: Penalty intensity
config.intensity.tooltip: Soft = lighter penalties. Hard = stronger penalties for gold, items, and XP.
config.penalties.tooltip: Choose which penalty types you want when you collapse and how strong they are.
config.gold.name: Enable gold penalties
config.gold.tooltip: When enabled, collapsing costs a percentage of your carried gold based on where you passed out.
config.items.name: Enable item penalties
config.items.tooltip: When enabled, you may lose extra inventory items (never tools) when you collapse.
config.xp.name: Enable XP penalties
config.xp.tooltip: When enabled, collapsing will remove some skill experience depending on where it happened.
config.maxgold.name: Max gold loss
config.maxgold.tooltip: Absolute cap on how much gold you can lose from a single collapse, regardless of percentage.
config.basegold.farm.tooltip: Percentage of carried gold lost when collapsing on your farm (before intensity and rescuer modifiers).
config.basegold.town.tooltip: Percentage of carried gold lost when collapsing in Pelican Town or nearby outdoor areas.
config.basegold.mines.tooltip: Percentage of carried gold lost when collapsing in mines, Skull Cavern, or volcano dungeon.
config.basegold.desert.tooltip: Percentage of carried gold lost when collapsing in the Calico Desert.
config.basegold.home.tooltip: Percentage of carried gold lost when collapsing inside your farmhouse.
config.basegold.other.tooltip: Percentage of carried gold lost when collapsing in other outdoor locations not listed above.
config.basexp.farming.tooltip: Amount of farming XP lost when collapsing in farm-related locations (like the farm).
config.basexp.combat.tooltip: Amount of combat XP lost when collapsing in dangerous locations (mines or desert).
config.basexp.foraging.tooltip: Amount of foraging XP lost when collapsing in town or general outdoor areas.
config.basexp.generic.tooltip: Fallback XP loss used when the location doesn't match any other category.
config.baseitems.mines: Base extra items lost in mines
config.baseitems.mines.tooltip: Base number of extra inventory items you can lose when collapsing in the mines.
config.baseitems.desert: Base extra items lost in desert
config.baseitems.desert.tooltip: Base number of extra inventory items you can lose when collapsing in the desert.
config.log.tooltip: Write a detailed summary of each collapse (rescuer, gold, items, XP) to the SMAPI console.
